author: Wayne Dyer
message: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
title: Thought of the day

author: G. K. Chesterton
message: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on man unless they act.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: If you propose to speak, always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Cadet Maxim
message: Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical.Expect more than others think is possible.
title: Thought of the day
